title: 🎇1 MONTH FREE🎇 Casual/Classy Crestview Apartments
map_address: N Lamar Blvd near Airport Blvd
posting_body: 😳A fascinating blend of old and new and right next to the Wall of Welcome, a mosaic that stretches 120 feet along Woodrow Avenue!
Great location, available mass transit and is roughly seven miles northeast of Downtown Austin.
🐕With a Pet Play Area, Bark Spa, and Pet Cleaning Station, you can take your furry friend out to play without leaving your home!
💦 A BEAUTIFUL Pool with a Private Courtyard, Fire Pits, Grills, and a Roof Terrace it's easy to make summer plans without leaving the grounds!
🏆They have a huge 24-hour fitness, an Open Aired Fitness Courtyard, Bike Storage, and Spa Inspired Bathrooms with a Soaking Tub to cool off and relax after your workout!
Please don't wait long, the prices and specials are subject to change any day so give me a shout and we can lock yours down today!
Call/Text Trent to check it out now.

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
